title: Trivia Crack v2.9.0 Ad free
description:
Have fun challenging your friends and enemies in the hottest trivia game!

Let our friendly spinner wheel, Willy, select which questions youâ€™ll answer from six different categories. Be the first to get the six crowns to win, but watch out for the rematch!

Need more? No problem:
